Decentralized hedge fund management on the Internet Computer

Welcome to ICP Hedge Fund! This platform is now streamlined for ICP.ninja deployment. Use the CLI commands below to interact with your hedge fund.

Quick Start Guide

Follow these steps to get started with your hedge fund on ICP.ninja:

1. Initialize the Fund

dfx canister call backend initializeFund '(record { name = "My Hedge Fund"; managementFeeBps = 200; performanceFeeBps = 2000; entranceFeeBps = 100; exitFeeBps = 100; minInvestment = 1000000000000000000000; })'

2. Get Test Tokens

dfx canister call backend mintTestTokens '(10000)'

3. Make a Deposit

dfx canister call backend deposit '(5000, 4500)'

4. Process Deposits (Admin)

dfx canister call backend processDeposits '(10)'

5. Check Your Balance

dfx canister call backend getMyShares "(principal \"$(dfx identity get-principal)\")"

Key Features

  • Decimal Precision Math (no Float loss)
  • Deposit/Redemption Queues
  • Advanced Fee Management
  • High Water Mark (HWM) System
  • Slippage Protection
  • Queue Cancellations

ICP Benefits

  • Enhanced Orthogonal Persistence
  • No Gas Fees (Cycles-based)
  • Native Canister Calls
  • ICRC-1 Token Standard Ready
  • Scalable Architecture
  • Secure by Design

Available Commands

Fund Information

dfx canister call backend getFundConfig
dfx canister call backend getCurrentNav
dfx canister call backend getTotalShares

Queue Management

dfx canister call backend getQueueStatus
dfx canister call backend getMyPending "(principal \"$(dfx identity get-principal)\")"

Redemptions

dfx canister call backend redeem '(1000, 900)'
dfx canister call backend processRedemptions '(10)'

Fee Information

dfx canister call backend getFeeBreakdown
dfx canister call backend getHWMStatus

Testing

dfx canister call backend testDecimal
Note: This is a simplified single-canister version for ICP.ninja. For production deployment with full features, use the multi-canister setup on mainnet.
